data.value: An unexpected error occurred. You have found a bug.

data.value: Name already exists.

data.name: MarketplaceNetworkIssueMsg
data.value: Network issues have interrupted your downloads from Marketplace. Please contact your network administrator.

data.name: MarketplaceDownloadFailureMsg
data.value: Failed to download projects and activities to local machine.

data.name: MarketplaceCancelFailureMsg
data.value: Failed to cancel downloading, please try again.

data.name: MarketplaceCachingMsg
data.value: Projects and activities have been downloaded to local machine, system is caching them.

data.name: WorkflowNameInvalidMsg
data.value: Workflow Name is invalid. A valid workflow name must begin with a letter and only can includes [a-z,A-Z,0-9,_] characters.\r\n

data.name: InvalidContentFileMsgFormat
data.value: File {0} provided in the content options is not a well formed xml document and won't be loaded.

data.name: CyclicDependenciesMsg
data.value: Cyclic dependency. Unable to upload to database because the dependency graph is not a Directed acyclic graph. This may be due to a a problem detecting the dependencies in the import process.

data.name: AssemblyNullMsg
data.value: Assembly parameter cannot be null.

data.name: AssemblyNameNullMsg
data.value: Assembly Name cannot be null.

data.name: AssemblyLocationNullMsg
data.value: Assembly Location cannot be null.

data.name: FileNotFoundMsg
data.value: The file specified does not exist.

data.name: NonDotNetAssemblyMsgFormat
data.value: The file '{0}' is not a .NET assembly and cannot be imported.

data.name: AssemblyCannotAnalyzeMsg
data.value: The assembly could not be analyzed and cannot not be imported.

data.name: AssemblyUnsignedMsg
data.value: Unsigned assemblies are not supported.

data.name: AssemblyListNullMsg
data.value: The list of assemblies to import is null.

data.name: AssemblyAlreadyImportedMsg
data.value: The assembly already exists in the local cache.

data.name: AssemblyInImportListMsg
data.value: The selected assembly is already in the list of assemblies to import.

data.name: CategoryNameNullMsg
data.value: The name of the category cannot be null.

data.name: CategoryNameOutOfRangeMsg
data.value: The name of the category exceeds the maximum length for the value.

data.name: InvalidCategoryNameMsg
data.value: The name of the category contains invalid characters.

data.name: ServerUnavailableMsg
data.value: The server is not available right now.

data.name: FeatureNotImplementedMsgFormat
data.value: Feature \"{0}\" has not yet been implemented

data.name: MarketplaceOpenedMsg
data.value: Do you want to close while the Marketplace View is open?

data.name: MarketplaceDownloadingMsg
data.value: Do you want to close while the Marketplace is processing download?

data.name: FileContainsNoWorkflowMsgFormat
data.value: The file '{0}' does not contain a valid workflow

data.name: DataDirtyMsgFormat
data.value: Do you want to save changes to {0} before closing?

data.name: CannotSaveLockedActivityMsg
data.value: This project was locked by an administrator. You are not allowed to save your changes to the server.

data.name: OpenInReadonlyMsgFormat
data.value: This workflow was locked by {0}. You will open it in read-only mode.

data.name: UnlockConfirmationMsgFormat
data.value: The workflow was locked by {0}. Would you like to unlock it?

data.name: CannotUnlockMsgFormat
data.value: The workflow was locked by administrator {0}. You cannot unlock it now.

data.name: KeepLockMsgFormat
data.value: {0} is locked by yourself, do you want to keep the lock?

data.name: SaveAndUnlockConfirmationMsgFormat
data.value: Do you want to save changes to {0} before unlock? The workflow will be read-only after unlocked.

data.name: MarketplaceCreateNewerVersionMsg
data.value: A newer version of this project exists in the Marketplace. Would you like to create a newer version?

data.name: MarketplaceDownloadNewerVersionMsg
data.value: A new version of this project exists in the Marketplace, you are not allowed to save your changes to the server. It is suggested that you save your work locally. Do you want to download the newer version?

data.name: CannotSaveDuplicatedWorkflowMsgFormat
data.value: The name \"{0}\" already exists in server, please use another one.

data.name: PrintConfirmationMsgFormat

data.value: Print failed due to {0}.

data.value: Please save the current project before performing this operations.

data.value: You cannot import an assembly which has same name of current workflow.

data.name: CompileErrorCompilingMsg

data.name: CompileUnsignedAssembliesMsgFormat
data.value: Project '{0}' relies upon unsigned assemblies.\r\nUnsigned assemblies are not supported in compiled workflows. Request a signed version of from the authors instead.\r\n{1}

data.name: CompileMultipleVersionsUsedMsgFormat
data.value:
Compiling a workflow with activities from different versions of the same assembly is not supported.

For instance, this workflow contains references to both '{0}' from assembly '{1}' and '{2}' from assembly '{3}'.

Rewrite your workflow to use only one version of assembly '{4}' and re-compile.

data.name: CompilePreviousSelfVersionMsgFormat
data.value: Compiling a workflow with activities from a previous compiled version of itself is not supported.\n\nRemove '{0}' from assembly '{1}' from the workflow and recompile.

data.name: ConnectQueryServiceFailureMsg
data.value: Failed to connect with QueryService.

data.value: This activity or it's parents have been assigned.

data.name: CannotGetLatestVersionMsg
data.value: This activity cannot get latest version.
